misc.no_access: You do not have access to this.
misc.message_delete_text:
Your message in <#<channelID>> was deleted by the system.

Channel is picture/video only.

options.amount: How many messages do you want to delete?

clear.error_max: A maximum of 100 messages can be deleted.
clear.error_min: A minimum of 1 message can be deleted.

lookup.description: Lookup player info from ingame server-id.
lookup.server_down: Seems like the server is down..
lookup.title: PLAYER LOOKUP (ID: <searchID>)

supportaccess.description: Give a user access to screenshare in a support channel.

options.user: What user do you want to grant screenshare access?
options.channel: What channel do you want to give access to? (1, 2, 3 etc.)

supportaccess.success: Gave <@<targetUserID>> access to screenshare and join <#<channelID>> for the next <timeLeft> minutes.

unwhitelist.wrong_channel: This command can only be used in <#<channel>>
unwhitelist.title: UNWHITELIST

whitelist.wrong_channel: This command can only be used in <#<channel>>
whitelist.title: WHITELIST

whitelistaccess.description: Give a user access to screenshare in a whitelist-interview channel.

options.user: What user do you want to grant screenshare access?
options.channel: What channel do you want to give access to? (1, 2, 3 etc.)

whitelistaccess.success: Gave <@<targetUserID>> access to screenshare and join <#<channelID>> for the next <timeLeft> minutes.
